en.elevation: Elevated permissions are required to install/uninstall this software.
en.commands: You can run the text version from the command line with the following command(s)
en.graphicalerror: The graphical version of this installer cannot run on this system
en.zenity: Try installing/updating Zenity, and run again
en.description: Click the buttons below to install or uninstall this remote management software. When installed, this software runs in the background allowing this computer to be managed and controlled by a remote administrator.
